channel.title: Finally saying 'hi' :)
channel.description:
Hello everyone :slight_smile:
I'm Peter, a developer and entrepreneur. While I'm originally from Germany I've been traveling for the last six years. I've also been living in New Zealand for quite a while during this time.
I work mostly on side-projects at the moment — for a mix of reasons (learning new tech, learning SEO, building businesses, etc.). Occasionally I'm writing articles around (bootstrapping) businesses. Looking forward to some interesting conversations here :slight_smile:
Peter

item.title: Finally saying 'hi' :)
item.dc:creator: spek
item.description:
